entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9602] It is expected that SharePremium with a value of 153,177,000 reported in the network role http://www.tmdx.com/role/ScheduleofShareCapitalandIssuancePremiumIncreasedTable, http://www.tmdx.com/role/ScheduleofCapitalStockandtheIssuancePremiumTable, http://www.tmdx.com/role/ConsolidatedBalanceSheet should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:SharePremiumMember and a reported value of 367,847,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.tmdx.com/role/ShareholdersEquityType2or3. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:SharePremium fact are:
Period : 2024-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals of SharePremium : -3 Decimals of Equity : -3 Rule version: 26.0.9 - ea0235301-20f_mdxhealth.htm 12985
